title: Taylor Momsen
summary: Taylor Michel Momsen[1] (born July 26, 1993)[2] is an American singer, songwriter, model, and former actress. Prior to her retirement from acting, she portrayed the character of Cindy Lou Who in the film How the Grinch Stole Christmas (2000) and Jenny Humphrey on The CW's teen drama series Gossip Girl (2007â€“2012).[3] Momsen is the frontwoman of the American rock band The Pretty Reckless.
